creator: support@ubikloadpack.com
text:
UBIK-INGENIERIE/UBIKLOADPACK grants the full rights to Apache to use the code “JMeter Dashboard/Report” donated by initial mail : 
http://mail-archives.apache.org/mod_mbox/jmeter-dev/201510.mbox/%3CCAH9fUpZJPtjfMh60QTKyGHZ8CFuG%3DuGvn9iaE_PhrkhjTb4jkg%40mail.gmail.com%3E


We send today a CCLA with schedule B to mention this donation.

Code currently hosted on :
- https://github.com/ubikloadpack/jmeter 
version 2.14-preview-ubikloadpack-2.0.0 (https://github.com/ubikloadpack/jmeter/tree/2.14-preview-ubikloadpack-2.0.0).

Code has been accepted by Apache JMeter technical vote:
- http://mail-archives.apache.org/mod_mbox/jmeter-dev/201511.mbox/%3C5654EC1E.60102%40apache.org%3E


You can see the output here:

    http://ubikloadpack.com/donations/dashboard/

Version 2.0.0 release has the following features:

    https://github.com/ubikloadpack/jmeter/issues?utf8=%E2%9C%93&q=milestone%3AV2

Remaining enhancements are here, your contributions are welcome:

    https://github.com/ubikloadpack/jmeter/issues?q=is%3Aopen+is%3Aissue+milestone%3AV3

Read user documentation at:

    http://ubikloadpack.com/donations/dashboard/docs/usermanual/generating-dashboard.html

And command line options at:

    http://ubikloadpack.com/donations/dashboard/docs/usermanual/get-started.html#options

If you find any issue (not known) or have an ida of an additional feature feel free to report it at:

- https://github.com/ubikloadpack/jmeter/issues



http://www.ubik-ingenierie.com
@
http://ubikloadpack.com
@ubikloadpack

creator: p.mouawad@ubik-ingenierie.com

text:
Created attachment 33305
I cannot be the Manager of donation, proposing Milamber :-)

IP Clearance is publish:
http://incubator.apache.org/ip-clearance/jmeter-dashboard-report.html

IP Clearance vote call:
http://mail-archives.apache.org/mod_mbox/incubator-general/201512.mbox/%3C56603825.5000804%40apache.org%3E
creator: milamber@apache.org

text:
The IP Clearance process is finished with success. The integration of JMeter Dashboard/Report code can be done from now into the JMeter source code.

Reference: http://incubator.apache.org/ip-clearance/jmeter-dashboard-report.html (see Related Votes section)
creator: milamber@apache.org
support@ubikloadpack.com
text:
Hello,
Donation being accepted find the PR for most up to date version.

https://github.com/apache/jmeter/pull/41

Donation IP Clearance mentioning V2, we  donate the V3 as part of our CCLA which contains the following fixes and enhancements:
- https://github.com/ubikloadpack/jmeter/issues?utf8=%E2%9C%93&q=+milestone%3AV3+

The V3 is fully sponsored by Ubik-Ingenierie/UbikLoadPack.

UBIK-INGENIERIE/UBIKLOADPACK releases any rights associated to this additional contribution and has of course signed a CCLA.

Regards

creator: p.mouawad@ubik-ingenierie.com
p.mouawad@ubik-ingenierie.com
text:
Hi,
I'll proceed tomorrow with commit of patch
Regards
